@p_hanger Hi, please DM us your flight information, your full name and email address, we will check and get back to you. /CL
@p_hanger Hi, kindly DM us your booking reference number and email address, we will track and send to you shortly. Thank you./CL

Thank you. /CL

@EliDunoff Hi Eli, for first class passenger,no guest is allowed entering lounge. If you are Skyteam Elite Plus member,one guest is allowed.

@tanapolt Please login to our website or contact local reservation center. Thanks./MC
@tanapolt Hi, advance seat selections available from 361 days to 48 hours before flight departure.
@jeehwan34 We regret for the inconvenience.Aircraft types are subject to change due to flight schedule,connection or other reason. Thanks/MC
@laurat2015 Hi, please contact our local reservation center and they will help you accordingly. Thanks/MC
@Thew0rstdrug Hi, we presently have no wifi on board.Please enjoy in-flight AVOD programs.Thanks for your understanding & have a nice day/MC
@RevGilliam Hi, hope you'll have a pleasant flight with us :) /MC

@MrSouthcott Hi, please stay tuned at https://t.co/UxLXUnDV0F for our future updates. Thanks. /MC
@mkeen8 Hi, glad you enjoyed our service! We look forward to flying with you again. Have a nice day!/MC

@TuttiFruttiPebs Hi,yes, you can claim your mileage by log in to your account:https://t.co/57i5o6CjCD . Thank you./CL
@Vishaar Hi, we are glad that you enjoyed our services. We will reflect your comment to the relevant team. See you on board again soon. /CL
@imankhir Hi, yes, you can request Moslem Meal prior to your flight. Thank you. /CL
@cesare90 We hope you enjoy the flight with us. Have a great journey! /CL
@Chrissyfacenyc We truly regret about this.Please DM us your experience and we'll reflect it to concerned department for attention.Thanks/MC
@marneechua Hi Marnee, thanks your comment. We hope you'll have another pleasant flight with us. Have a good day!/MC
@Stratman_Lynn Hi, Lynn, glad you enjoyed our service. We look forward to flying with you again. Have a nice day! /MC
@twinfold Hi, our airport staff will assist you as much as they can. Sorry for the inconvenience and hope you'll have a pleasant flight./MC
It's a lovely morning in Seoul. Happy Friday! /CL https://t.co/6XwkEBrXu1
@IanNeon Hi, glad you enjoy flying with us. We look forward to serving you again. Have a nice day./MC
@snakenov @KoreanTravel Hi, kindly visit https://t.co/UxLXUnDV0F to check our online promotional fares from time to time. Thanks./MC

@dothacker81 Yes, you may check with our crew once board in the flight. Thank you./CL
@dothacker81 Yes, there will be power plug in between the seat. Thank you./CL
@JanusKR We are glad that you enjoyed our services, and we looking forward to serve you on board again soon! Have a great day. /CL

https://t.co/Pj4inaDtag . Thank you./CL
